content: {"name": "Hearts to Nourish Hope, Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Must bring smartphone to scan a QR code on the location.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.heartstonourishhope.org/food", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "640 Georgia 138", "address_2": null, "city": "Riverdale", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30274", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.5469059, "longitude": -84.4116047}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 997-4511", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Acquire QR code scan"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
